Gets and display weather information. Data comes from http://worldweatheronline.com/
{%P}{%command} address

Menages room affiliations.
{%P}{%command} affiliation - Displays all user with specified affiliation. {%P}{%command} affiliation user [reason] - Sets user affiliation to specified one.
Available affiliations: Owner - Rooms owner, you shouldn't grant it to anyone, Admin - operator/administrator, Member - Member of room, None - Default affiliation, Outcast - banned.

Gives or revokes ban. Result is same as using affiliation outcast.
{%P}{%command} user [reason]
You can use -u flag to unban user. {%P}{%command} jid -u

Kicks out specified user. Result is same as using role none.
{%P}{%command} user [reason]

Sets role of specified user.
{%P}{%command} user role [reason]
If you want to auto role someone just add -a flag. {%P}{%command} user role [reason] -a
Available roles: Moderator - Rooms moderator, Participant - Room user with gained voice, Visitor - Room user without voice, None - Kicked out user.
